items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the changes within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds for 95% of requests
Support for at least 100 concurrent active users

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to organize tasks into shared boards accessible by all members.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create, edit, and delete boards visible to all team members.
Board changes are synchronized in real-time for all viewers.
non_functional: Support drag-and-drop task movement without page reload

notes: Assumed that 'team collaboration features' include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat or file sharing may be considered in future requirements.
